name: Chilliwack West Recreational Map
description: A waterproof, tearproof 1:30,000 scale map for the lakes and mountains around western Chilliwack, BC. It’s GPS-based with contour lines, roads, trails, and local info. Includes Cultus Lake, Mount Thom, Elk/Thurston, the Trans-Canada Trail, Vedder Ridge, International Ridge, Liumchen Ecological Reserve, Vedder River, and the Skagit Range mountains.
